title: CSUSB Recreation and Wellness Center
text: The CSUSB Recreation and Wellness Center operates Monday to Friday from 6 AM to 10 PM, and weekends from 8 AM to 6 PM.

title: CSUSB Recreation and Wellness Center
text: The Rec Center offers a gym, swimming pool, rock climbing wall, indoor track, courts for basketball and volleyball, and fitness classes.

title: CSUSB Recreation and Wellness Center - Membership
text: CSUSB students have access to the Recreation and Wellness Center through their student fees. Faculty, staff, and alumni can purchase memberships.

title: CSUSB Recreation and Wellness Center - Fitness Programs
text: The Recreation and Wellness Center offers a variety of fitness classes including yoga, spin, Zumba, and more.

title: CSUSB Recreation and Wellness Center - Facilities
text: Our facilities include a fitness center with cardio and weight equipment, swimming pool, climbing wall, basketball courts, racquetball courts, and a multipurpose activity center.

title: CSUSB Recreation and Wellness Center - Hours
text: The Recreation and Wellness Center is open Monday through Friday from 6am to 10pm, and on weekends from 8am to 6pm.

title: CSUSB Recreation and Wellness Center - Membership Cost
text: Students have access through fees. Faculty/staff: $40/month. Alumni: $45/month. Community: $50/month.

title: CSUSB Recreation and Wellness Center - Personal Training
text: Certified personal trainers are available at additional cost for one-on-one or group sessions to help meet your fitness goals.

title: CSUSB Recreation and Wellness Center - Climbing Wall
text: The climbing wall is 34 feet tall with multiple routes for various skill levels from beginner to advanced.

title: CSUSB Recreation and Wellness Center - Lockers
text: Day-use lockers are free with your own lock. Long-term rental lockers are available for a quarterly fee.
